author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/releases/tag/1.31.10

We have bumped Sepolia and Holesky to 60m to capture any interesting data ASAP.

Let's avoid doing Hoodi for now so we can check those two and then go Hoodi next IMO.

author: bridge-bot
content: <jacobkaufmann> is there a running note of findings/bottlenecks identified from the perfnet experiments?

author: bridge-bot
content: <notnotstorm_p> almost every concern about raising the gas limit will be cleared up once the performance testnet state size reaches 2x - 3x the size of mainnet

author: bridge-bot
content:
<CPerezz> re: **@notnotstorm_p**
> almost every concern about raising the gas limit will be cleared up once the performance testnet state size reaches 2x - 3x the size of mainnet
Following up in this soon.

Anyways, its important to highlight that there are some things we dont account for nowadays that when reach much larger state sizes would have impact.

Hence why on ACDE I asked for metrics to collect and state-bloat attack vectors that we can implement in spamoor and bombard the testnet with.

Arrive to that size isn't enough. Its about finding new worst cases there and fix them to clear the road for 7938 for example.
